lead_paragraph: KRESS--Alan. Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the loss of our long-time member, Alan Kress, beloved husband of Marilyn Kress. We will miss his caring and devotion to family, friends and synagogue. Our deepest condolences to Marilyn, their daughter Marielle, son-in-law Eric and all their dear ones. Robert N. Levine, D.D., Senior Rabbi Martin Flumenbaum, President 1/3
